tool_description: The ITA Offices & Centers API provides contact and address information for all of ITA’s domestic and international export assistance centers. There are almost 200 ITA centers worldwide whose locations are managed by ITA’s internal office management system.
name: ITA Offices Centers
title: ITA Offices Centers

api_list.name: /api.trade.gov/v2/ita_office_locations/search
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dataservices-ita-offices-centers-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api.trade.gov/v2/ita_office_locations/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dataservices-ita-offices-centers-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dataservices-ita-offices-centers-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api.trade.gov/v2/ita_office_locations/search"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dataservices-ita-offices-centers-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
